Description: Sherd (wall); pottery; turqouise glaze on the inside; relief ornament with turquoise, green and brown glaze on the outside.
Bibliographic references: Wallis 1891 / Persian Ceramic Art Belonging to Mr F DuCane Godman, FRS: The Thirteenth Century Lustred Vases (Appendix pl.xii.6)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
